nodes.text: the Congress has lost in Gujarat whatever the outcome of the December 12 election in that state
The Congress has failed to set the political agenda.
If the Congress has failed to set the political agenda in Gujarat they have lost in Gujarat whatever the outcome of the December 12 election

It has allowed the vituperative eloquence of Narendra Modi and Company to seep into its consciousness and cause it to second-guess its opponent tread warily speak in whispers. It has allowed itself to be spooked into submission into donning elaborate masks and disguises.

If it has allowed the vituperative eloquence of Modi and Company to seep into its consciousness and cause it to second-guess its opponent tread warily and speak in whispers and it has allowed itself to be spooked into submission then it has failed to set the political agenda
